{{Location Intro|description=It was the home of the [[Aranara]] for hundreds of years before the [[cataclysm]].<ref>{{Ref/Quest|For the Children of the Past}}</ref><p>It is unlocked by completing the [[Aranyaka]]: Part III - [[Nursery of Lost Dreams]] quest, ''[[For Fruits, Seeds, and Trees]]''.</p>}}

Until the [[Aranyaka]]: Part III - [[Nursery of Lost Dreams]] quest, ''[[For All Children Who Long for Life]]'' is completed, Old Vanarana is completely engulfed in [[The Withering]] which has a stronger effect than most other locations.
